qigong.title: Qigong – Self-healing Techniques | Gong and Motion
qigong.description: Learn to cultivate health, emotional balance, and spiritual growth with our medical Qigong workshops in Sweden.
qigong.hero_subtitle: Learn to cultivate health, emotional balance, and spiritual growth with our medical Qigong workshops in Sweden.

benefits.emotional_harmony: Emotional harmony and peace of mind

what_is_qigong.question: What is Medical Qigong?
what_is_qigong.answer: Medical Qigong is an ancient Chinese practice that combines movement, breath, and intention to promote health, healing, and spiritual growth. It is used for self-healing, prevention, and as a complement to Western medicine.

experience_needed.question: Do I need any experience to join?
experience_needed.answer: No experience is needed. Our workshops are suitable for all levels, including complete beginners. You will be guided step by step.

what_to_bring.question: What should I bring to a Qigong class?
what_to_bring.answer: Wear comfortable clothes that allow you to move freely. Bring a water bottle and an open mind!

stress_anxiety.question: Can Qigong help with stress and anxiety?
stress_anxiety.answer: Yes! Qigong is known for its calming effects on the mind and body. Many participants report reduced stress, improved sleep, and greater emotional balance.
